Plot: When a lonely snowman wants to be part of the holiday fun, he decides to impersonate Santa! A hilarious clash that ensues where rocket-propelled reindeer face-off against snowball-launching igloos! ( Get it in 3D or 2D!!!!! )
Title: Santa vs. the Snowman 3D
Actors: Jonathan Winters, Ben Stein, Victoria Jackson, Don LaFontaine
